org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a

Class S3GuardExistsRetryPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.S3ARetryPolicy
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.S3GuardExistsRetryPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.retry.RetryPolicy

    public class S3GuardExistsRetryPolicy
extends S3ARetryPolicy
    Slightly-modified retry policy for cases when the file is present in the MetadataStore, but may be still throwing FileNotFoundException from S3.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.hadoop.io.retry.RetryPolicy
